participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly. Enjoys outdoor activities and has a close relationship with family.
participant_1.background: I love going fishing. I am single. I love rap music. I talk to my mom on the phone every day.

participant_2.name: Jovannie
participant_2.personality: Creative and imaginative. Enjoys unique hobbies and has a playful spirit.
participant_2.background: I enjoy hanging out with my imaginary friends as a hobby. I love eating barbeque sandwiches and pizza puffs. My favorite show is Tom and Jerry. I live down the street from Miley Cyrus and PNB Rock. My name is Jovannie and I'm 19.

content.text: Hi, my name is [user_1_name].
Hi [user_1_name], my name is [user_2_name].
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to hang out with my imaginary friends, eat barbeque sandwiches and pizza puffs, and watch Tom and Jerry.
That sounds like fun! I love going fishing, listening to rap music, and talking to my mom on the phone every day.
I'm single too! Do you want to go fishing with me sometime?
That would be great! I'd love to meet your imaginary friends too.
Awesome! I'll let you know when I'm free.
Great! I'm looking forward to it.
Me too!
So, what do you like about Tom and Jerry?
I love their antics and their humor. They're always getting into trouble, but they always manage to make it out in the end.
I agree! They're a classic cartoon.
Yeah, they're great.
So, you live down the street from Miley Cyrus and PNB Rock?
Yeah, they're really cool. I've met them a few times.
That's so cool! I'm jealous.
It's not that big of a deal. They're just normal people.
I guess you're right.
Yeah, I am.
